price: Mereka menjawab, "Apakah kamu datang kepada kami dengan sungguh-sungguh ataukah kamu termasuk orang-orang yang bermain-main 962?"
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ
footnotes: 962.  Maksudnya, apakah kamu menyeru kami kepada agamamu sebenar-benarnya atau kamu hanya bermain-main?

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
